definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: High order, high precision geopotential models have broad application.
sentences.chinese: 高階高精度地球重力場模型具有廣泛的用途。

sentences.english: The gravity of a black hole is so strong that not even light can escape it.
sentences.chinese: 黑洞的引力場很強，光也無法逃出。

sentences.english: The paper presents a successful try-out of using the boundary element method for the stress analysis of a steam turbine rotor.
sentences.chinese: 採用邊界元法對汽輪機轉子的應力場進行分析。

sentences.english: After the earthquake, the gravity field relaxed and resumed inversely.
sentences.chinese: 震後重力場松馳反向恢復。

sentences.english: the curl of a force field measures the torque per unit moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 力場的旋度是，描述扭轉力矩與轉動慣量比值的量。

sentences.english: Thus, it is considered that crustal stress field in the area investigated are relatively stable and uniform since Neogene.
sentences.chinese: 晚第三紀以來，該區構造應力場相對穩定和統一。

sentences.english: The photoelastic method and the speckle technique are sued for measuring the stress and displacement field respectively.
sentences.chinese: 分別用光彈法及散斑法測出試件的應力場及位移場。

sentences.english: The surviving Covenant ships struggled to accelerate out of the gravity well.
sentences.chinese: 倖存的聖約人艦隊加速逃離了重力場。

sentences.english: The analysed results indicated that air bearing press field is distributed in peak state.
sentences.chinese: 分析結果表明，空氣軸承的壓力場呈現尖峯狀分佈。

sentences.english: It tells you that you cannot get energy for free out of your force field.
sentences.chinese: 就意味着你不可能在力場裏面無償地得到能量。

sentences.english: In the process we will try to achieve gravitation of a cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 在這個過程中我們嘗試獲得一個厚紙板的重力場。

sentences.english: In this paper it is shown that there are two vector constants of the motion for a charged particle in the central field of force.
sentences.chinese: 證明了帶電粒子在有心力場中運動時有兩個守恆矢量。

sentences.english: The microlensing method, which looks for distortions in light caused by a star's gravitational field.
sentences.chinese: 微距法，即觀察因恆星重力場所引起的光線扭曲。

sentences.english: Standard forces are automatically added here when they are created.
sentences.chinese: 在模擬場景力會建立一個力場組。

sentences.english: It discusses the seismic source stress field by using many kinds of force sources.
sentences.chinese: 由多種力源討論了震源應力場。

sentences.english: The balance of their fleet had escaped the gravity of Onyx and outdistanced their persuaders.
sentences.chinese: 他們的飛船逃離了重力場，把追蹤者拋在了後面。

definition: vivid and colorful (idiom); true to life/lively and realistic
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
to have no sense of shame/brazen
